description.narrative: The Education Policy Framework 2004-2019 (EPF) was developed by the Government of Tonga (GoT) and Ministry of Education and aims to improve equitable access and quality of universal basic education; improve access and quality of post-basic education and to improve the administration of education and training. As part of the implementation of the EPF, a Tonga Education Support Program (TESP) with funding support from NZAID and the World Bank is to implemented to improve: quality of schooling; education outcomes; strengthen public expenditure management; policy making; and monitoring and evaluation. The program was expanded in 2006 to include development of short-term training and technical and vocational education and training. The total value of Australia's contribution is $0.5 million over 2 years, starting 2008-089.
